properties.address: Etive House Care Home, Argyll PA37 1QW
properties.description: Etive House is a lovely , warm and friendly residential home where the kettle is always on !
properties.title: Etive House Care Home

properties.address: Port Appin Village Hall, Port Appin, Appin, PA38 4DE
properties.description: Tuesday mornings 14 January until 18 March 10am-12pm Drop-in for a blether, hot drink & cake. They will have lots of board games and cards available too No need to book just pop along. The Hub is FREE to attend & all are very welcome The Community Vehicle will be available to transport registered passengers to the Hub at no charge, please contact Isobel to find out more [email protected] Please contact Victoria Kynaston to find out more about the Health & Wellbeing Programme and the work of ACDT [email protected]/[email protected]
properties.title: Appin Community Development Trust

properties.description: Thursdays 12-2.30pm Organised by St Modan’s Church in collaboration with Bookends Benderloch. The hall is just behind the church and all are welcome. They provide a Soup and Bread lunch, tea and coffee, an opportunity to chat and to take away books to read. This is a Free Event.
properties.title: Books, Broth, Blether

properties.description: Wednesdays from 11am – 1pm Crossroads North Argyll will be providing a warm space for unpaid carers on Wednesdays from 11am – 1pm. They will be providing hot drinks, biscuits and a blether with other unpaid carers in a warm space.
properties.title: Crossroads North Argyll

properties.description: Monday - Friday 11am - 5pm Monday - 2pm-3.30pm Fellowship Café Tuesday - 2pm-3.30pm Craft cafe Tuesday - 5pm Evening Meal Wednesday - 2pm-3.30pm Stork Café Thursday - 10am-3pm Moving On at Green Shoots Thursday - 11am- 12pm Recovery Café Thursday - 2pm-4pm Wellbeing Café Friday - 12pm-3.30pm Music Group Friday - 14.30pm Quiz Friday - 5pm Evening Meal

properties.address: Muir Street, Boswell House, 14 Argyll Square, Oban, PA34 4BD
properties.description: Tuesdays 12-2 Pop in for a breakfast roll and a chat!
properties.title: We Are With You

properties.description: The building is warm, there is plenty of space and everyone is very welcome. a programme of different events, activities and drop-in sessions throughout the winter. These will change each month with announcements made on the website page and via flyers that you can pick up in the Centre. Available for the duration of the project, they have made a custom Winter Warmer free membership. Just ask at Reception about the Winter Warmer membership and their team will tell you more.
properties.title: Atlantis Leisure

properties.address: Rockfield Brae, Oban, Stevenson Street, Argyll PA34 5DQ
properties.description: Open every day, 10-4 The space is open to all, and offers affordable and nutritious food and drink with a ‘by donation' or ‘pay what you can' option. Wednesdays 12-2 Community soup lunch
properties.title: The Rockfield Cafe

properties.description: Warm Wednesdays 3.30-5pm Pop in for a warm welcome and a hot cuppa, everyone is welcome.
